summary:
I do not take credit for making this mod.
<br />Original mod at http://aceeqmodding.weebly.com/dark-fantasy-overhaul.html
descriptionHtml:
[b]Dark Fantasy Overhaul[/b] is a landscape and environmental overhaul for skyrim, which aims to create an unique dark fantasy atmosphere and give the game a completely new feeling. This mod only edits landscapes and environmental aspects of the game, so it's mostly compatible with most mods out there.
<br />
<br />[color=#e0bf5c][b]Version 0.9.1 should be considered as a beta[/b][/color], so remember their will be some issues! There will be future updates with fixes, improvements and other features to make this mod even better. You will have to set the[b] priority of DFO in Mod Organizer to a higher number than SFO[/b] or any other environment mod.
<br />
<br />[b]Version 0.9.1 requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul 2.0+[/url] to look as intended[/b]. Since I've build the treelod with TES5LodGen and used the tree lod images from skyrim flora overhaul 2.0+ it's an requirement for the beta version. Furter versions may also contain tree lods for vanilla skyrim. As of now it's required. It is anyway looking much better with SFO - so do use it with it!
<br />[img]http://aceeqmodding.weebly.com/uploads/1/8/8/0/18801276/2127265_orig.png[/img]
<br />
<br />[size=4]FEATURES[/size][table][list]
<br />[*]New trees and other environment assets
<br />[*]Overhaul of the marsh region with morrowind styled mushrooms and flora
<br />[*]reworked some of the regions with new assets (marsh, tundra, volcanic tundra) - [color=#da4444][b]WORK IN PROGRESS[/b][/color]
<br />[*]new 2k textures ground textures (optional) - [color=#da4444][b]NOT AVAILABLE[/b][/color]
<br />[*]new LOD for dead trees
<br />[*]fully compatible with Skyrim Flora Overhaul, should be used together with SFO for the best look
<br />[*]Realistic Aspen Trees included (2k textures) 
<br />[/list]
<br />[/table]
<br />[img]http://aceeqmodding.weebly.com/uploads/1/8/8/0/18801276/6122807_orig.png[/img]
<br />[size=4]COMPATIBILITY[/size][list]
<br />[*]Most mods should work fine. You can use any environment (grass, plants) overhaul you want together with DFO. Only tree mods, except Skyrim Flora Overhaul, won't work.
<br />[*]fully compatible with all weather mods and ENB's.
<br />[*]this mod should in general be compatible with all mods out there.
<br />[/list]
<br />[table] [size=4]INSTALLATIONR[/size][size=4]ECOMMENDED MODS[/size][/table]
<br />[table]Download the mod manually from here and install with a mod manager of your choice. Mod Organizer is highly recommended to install this mod.
<br />
<br />If you want use Dark Fantasy Overhaul together with Skyrim Flora Overhaul make sure to adjust the priority of Dark Fantasy Overhaul in mod organizer to a higher number as Skyrim Flora Overhaul.
<br />[/table]
<br />[img]http://aceeqmodding.weebly.com/uploads/1/8/8/0/18801276/6150469_orig.png[/img]
<br />[table][size=4]RECOMMENDED MODS[/size][/table]
<br />
<br />
<br />If you want use Dark Fantasy Overhaul together with Skyrim Flora Overhaul make sure to adjust the priority of Dark Fantasy Overhaul in mod organizer to a higher number as Skyrim Flora Overhaul.
<br />[list]
<br />[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56137/?][size=2]Realistic Clouds[/size][/url]
<br />[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?]Pure Water[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two[/url][/size]
<br />[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50501/?][size=2]Grim and Somber ENB[/size][/url]
<br />[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828/][size=2]Bleak or Unbleak ENB[/size][/url]
<br />[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5388/?][size=2]Real Ice ALL-IN-ONE[/size][/url]
<br />[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4805/?][size=2]AOF Detailed Mountains[/size][/url]
<br />[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6411/][size=2]Clear World Map[/size][/url]
<br />[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10383/][size=2]Better Dynamic Snow[/size][/url]
<br />[*][size=2][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043/]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url][/size]
<br />[/list]
<br />[/table]
<br />[img]http://aceeqmodding.weebly.com/uploads/1/8/8/0/18801276/4409447_orig.png[/img]
author: Aceeq Modding
